H0.text: a drug that might be used in surgery for its amnesic properties is. Propofol

H1.text: a drug that might be used in surgery for its amnesic properties is. Ketamine

H2.text: a drug that might be used in surgery for its amnesic properties is. Etomidate

H3.text: a drug that might be used in surgery for its amnesic properties is. Benzodiazepines

A4.text: Lorazepam has particularly marked amnesic properties that may make it more effective when amnesia is the desired effect.

A5.text: They also produce amnesia, which can be useful, as patients may not remember unpleasantness from the procedure.
